snippet.textDisplay:
Spiritomb (from Pokemon) is number 108, has 108 sprites, weighs 108kg, and its defence and special defence base stats are 108. This is based on the number of temptations a person must overcome to reach Nirvana in Buddhism. So maybe the character number is based on all the temptations you must overcome?
The more you know ;)
snippet.textOriginal:

The more you know ;)

snippet.textDisplay: Exactly, glad I saw this before I posted.  This game is HEAVILY taking after a chinese style, from stories to similar-esque lore.  It is very chinese, which is why im surprised there aren't as many chinese inspired characters.  You have mostly westernized characters, but looking at Riou you can clearly see the inspiration.
snippet.textOriginal: Exactly, glad I saw this before I posted.  This game is HEAVILY taking after a chinese style, from stories to similar-esque lore.  It is very chinese, which is why im surprised there aren't as many chinese inspired characters.  You have mostly westernized characters, but looking at Riou you can clearly see the inspiration.

snippet.textDisplay: Yep, the Suikoden saga is indeed inspired by this. Small correction : it's a chinese classic, not japanese. "suikoden" is the japanese name of this epic.
snippet.textOriginal: Yep, the Suikoden saga is indeed inspired by this. Small correction : it's a chinese classic, not japanese. "suikoden" is the japanese name of this epic.

snippet.textDisplay:
$15?  I thought this was one of the most infamously rare games ever!

Speaking of which, I like how two games that were once in that conversation - Earthbound and System Shock 2 - have lost their rarity this year thanks to being available on digital distribution services.  Now we just need this game and Panzer Dragoon Saga to join lol.

snippet.textDisplay: 108 playable charcaters? Besides being am impressive number, I am positive that that's a reference to 108 bandits from the "Water Margin", a Japanese epic/ collection of adventures, in a similar vein to King Arthur, or modern super-heroe teams.
snippet.textOriginal: 108 playable charcaters? Besides being am impressive number, I am positive that that's a reference to 108 bandits from the "Water Margin", a Japanese epic/ collection of adventures, in a similar vein to King Arthur, or modern super-heroe teams.

snippet.textDisplay: Had a great time playing it. Luca Blight man, someone I love to hate.
snippet.textOriginal: Had a great time playing it. Luca Blight man, someone I love to hate.

snippet.textDisplay: Great mature political story, awesome celtic style, a cast of 108 characters to choose from, one of the best gaming villains in Luca Blight and a fun battle system. Those are some of the ingredients that make this RPG so good and one of my favorites ever. It also has one of my favorite boss themes ever, Gothic Neclord Battle (Best VGM 78). Getting this game in mint condition for 15 dollars was one hell of a lucky deal.
snippet.textOriginal: Great mature political story, awesome celtic style, a cast of 108 characters to choose from, one of the best gaming villains in Luca Blight and a fun battle system. Those are some of the ingredients that make this RPG so good and one of my favorites ever. It also has one of my favorite boss themes ever, Gothic Neclord Battle (Best VGM 78). Getting this game in mint condition for 15 dollars was one hell of a lucky deal.
